1.content:
Link was a fool to think he could challenge Master Ganondorf's power he had been cursing himself for this for a whole year. Master Ganondorf after defeating Link cruelly turned him into a slave with beatings and severe punishments for not serving anyone and everyone he was ordered to. Then one day Ganondorf got bored of Link and took the bitch to the Water Temple locking him in Morphia's chamber telling the Monster Link was his pet now.

That was five years ago

Link lay on the cold floor waiting for his owner to rape him like every morning...if it was morning Link hasn't seen sunlight in years.
The monster seeped into vines and wrapped round Link's legs and held Link into the air. The monster was role playing as a tentacle monster it wanted to spice up Link's rapes. Two more tentacle dove into Link's asshole which was stretchered out now.

It still hurt like hell. But it was the same old same old for Link water or vines it was the same thing day in and day out.

"Am I being unoriginal!" it yelled

"n-no Master" Link replied "I'm sorry I'll try and fight and scream more" he said

"It's been five years bitch Ganon has taken over Hyrule fully and now I think I have some ideas how to spice this up now Ganon can relax his forces!"
1.title: Link's years of hell

info.brief_description: Link has been given Morpha as a pet.
info.description: Link is Morpha's slave boy. ANYTHING goes.
